title: Donald Trump Attacks Kamala Harris, Questions Her Competence
content: Donald Trump, the former US president and presumptive presidential nominee of the Republican Party, attacked Vice President Kamala Harris, raising questions on her competence and describing her as an "insurance policy" for President Joe Biden.
summary: Donald Trump, the former US president and presumptive presidential nominee of the Republican Party, attacked Vice President Kamala Harris, raising questions on her competence and describing her as an "insurance policy" for President Joe Biden.

title: Look Up! A Once-In-A-Lifetime Explosion Is About To Create A 'New' Star
content: Any night now, a "new star" or nova will appear in the night sky. While it wont set the sky ablaze, its a special opportunity to see a rare event thats usually difficult to predict in advance.
summary: Any night now, a "new star" or nova will appear in the night sky. While it wont set the sky ablaze, its a special opportunity to see a rare event thats usually difficult to predict in advance.

title: Playground Fights To White House Bids, A Look At "Stubborn" Biden's Life
content: Anyone expecting Joe Biden to step aside from the US presidential race without a fight had not fully considered the life story of a proud but often stubborn man.
summary: Anyone expecting Joe Biden to step aside from the US presidential race without a fight had not fully considered the life story of a proud but often stubborn man.

title: US Mass Shooter Agrees To Donate Brain To Science In Unique Settlement
content: The unusual condition was proposed by an attorney representing Anthony Borges, 21, who was shot five times during the attack.
summary: The unusual condition was proposed by an attorney representing Anthony Borges, 21, who was shot five times during the attack.

title: Miss Universe Singapore Now Open For Mothers, Married, Divorced Women
content: The Miss Universe Singapore beauty pageant is now open to all Singaporean women above 18 years of age, irrespective of their marital status. The upper age limit has  also been removed by the organization.
summary: The Miss Universe Singapore beauty pageant is now open to all Singaporean women above 18 years of age, irrespective of their marital status. The upper age limit has  also been removed by the organization.

title: "Make No Mistake, Russia Failing In This War": Biden Slams Putin
content: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday announced a historic donation of air-defence equipment for Ukraine and said Russia is failing in this war.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday announced a historic donation of air-defence equipment for Ukraine and said Russia is failing in this war.

title: Days After India Visit, Bangladesh PM In China To Hold Talks With Xi Jinping
content: Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina arrived here on Tuesday on a four-day visit for talks with China's top leadership, including President Xi Jinping and Premier Li Qiang to further cement the bilateral strategic ties.
summary: Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina arrived here on Tuesday on a four-day visit for talks with China's top leadership, including President Xi Jinping and Premier Li Qiang to further cement the bilateral strategic ties.

title: "Biden Not Competent, Kamala Harris Would Be Disaster For US": Nikki Haley
content: Indian American Republican leader Nikki Haley also released the several dozen delegates she had won during the party's presidential primaries early this year for the presumptive nominee, Donald Trump.
summary: Indian American Republican leader Nikki Haley also released the several dozen delegates she had won during the party's presidential primaries early this year for the presumptive nominee, Donald Trump.

title: How Doctors Saved 5-Month-Old Baby During Airstrike At Ukraine Hospital
content: Oleh Holubchenko's team was in the middle of surgery on five-month-old Taras when an explosive wave sent the medics flying across the room.
summary: Oleh Holubchenko's team was in the middle of surgery on five-month-old Taras when an explosive wave sent the medics flying across the room.

title: Canada Accused Of Keeping Migrants In Chains, Strip-Searching Them
content: The Canadian government is being sued for allegedly violating migrants' rights by detaining them alongside criminal suspects while awaiting processing of their status, lawyers for the migrants said Tuesday.
summary: The Canadian government is being sued for allegedly violating migrants' rights by detaining them alongside criminal suspects while awaiting processing of their status, lawyers for the migrants said Tuesday.

title: Europe's Ariane 6 Rocket Launched After 4-Year Delay
content: Europe's new Ariane 6 rocket successfully blasted off for the first time on Tuesday, releasing satellites into orbit and restoring the continent's independent access to space.
summary: Europe's new Ariane 6 rocket successfully blasted off for the first time on Tuesday, releasing satellites into orbit and restoring the continent's independent access to space.

title: Use "Special Partnership" With Russia To Stop Ukraine War: US Tells India
content: The US wants India to use its "special partnership" with Russia to put "pressure" on Moscow to stop the ongoing conflict in Ukraine and work for a durable peace in the region, US State Department Hindustani spokesperson, Margaret MacLeod said.
summary: The US wants India to use its "special partnership" with Russia to put "pressure" on Moscow to stop the ongoing conflict in Ukraine and work for a durable peace in the region, US State Department Hindustani spokesperson, Margaret MacLeod said.

title: 27 Killed In Strike On Gaza School Sheltering Palestinians: Report
content: Palestinian sources said at least 29 people were killed Tuesday in a strike on a school being used to shelter displaced people in Gaza, the fourth such incident in four days, with Hamas blaming Israel for the deaths.
summary: Palestinian sources said at least 29 people were killed Tuesday in a strike on a school being used to shelter displaced people in Gaza, the fourth such incident in four days, with Hamas blaming Israel for the deaths.

title: Australia Accuses China-Backed Hacker Group Of Stealing User Data
content: Cybersecurity firms backed by the Chinese authorities have been accused of stealing passwords and usernames from unnamed Australian networks in 2022, the Australian Cyber Security Centre (ACSC) reported on Tuesday.
summary: Cybersecurity firms backed by the Chinese authorities have been accused of stealing passwords and usernames from unnamed Australian networks in 2022, the Australian Cyber Security Centre (ACSC) reported on Tuesday.

title: Biden To Meet Zelensky At NATO Summit Tomorrow
content: US President Joe Biden will meet his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky at NATO's 75th anniversary summit in Washington on Thursday to show "unwavering support" for Kyiv, the White House said.
summary: US President Joe Biden will meet his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky at NATO's 75th anniversary summit in Washington on Thursday to show "unwavering support" for Kyiv, the White House said.

title: US Says India Has Ability To Urge Putin To End War In Ukraine
content: India's relationship with Russia gives it an ability to urge President Vladimir Putin to end its war with Ukraine, White House spokesperson Karine Jean-Pierre said on Tuesday.
summary: India's relationship with Russia gives it an ability to urge President Vladimir Putin to end its war with Ukraine, White House spokesperson Karine Jean-Pierre said on Tuesday.

title: Biden Would Serve Full Second Term If Elected: White House
content: US President Joe Biden is committed to serving a full second term if reelected in November, the White House said Tuesday, as the 81-year-old fights for political survival as concerns mount over his age and fitness.
summary: US President Joe Biden is committed to serving a full second term if reelected in November, the White House said Tuesday, as the 81-year-old fights for political survival as concerns mount over his age and fitness.

title: 8 Killed As Storm Beryl Sweeps Across US, Death Count Rises To 18
content: At least eight people were killed in the southern United States after storm Beryl felled trees and caused heavy flooding, before being downgraded to a post-tropical cyclone on Tuesday.
summary: At least eight people were killed in the southern United States after storm Beryl felled trees and caused heavy flooding, before being downgraded to a post-tropical cyclone on Tuesday.

title: Saudi Teacher Gets 20-Year Jail Term Over Critical Social Media Posts
content: Saudi Arabia has sentenced a teacher to 20 years in prison over critical social media posts, Human Rights Watch and the convicted man's brother said Tuesday.
summary: Saudi Arabia has sentenced a teacher to 20 years in prison over critical social media posts, Human Rights Watch and the convicted man's brother said Tuesday.

title: 10 Killed In Strike On School In Gaza, Fourth Attack In 4 Days: Report
content: A Gaza hospital source said at least 10 people were killed and dozens wounded Tuesday in a strike on a school turned shelter for displaced Palestinians, the fourth such attack in four days.
summary: A Gaza hospital source said at least 10 people were killed and dozens wounded Tuesday in a strike on a school turned shelter for displaced Palestinians, the fourth such attack in four days.
